doc.title: Feel My Sting
doc.plot: A couple of girls named Brittany and Lisa are camping in the woods. Lisa begins to work on her busty blonde friend's imagination, telling her of a terrible woodland creature who enslaves and tortures it's victims. Spooky events follow, beginning with an eerie, dreamlike sequence in the forest fog during which Brittany assumes the guise of a sadist. In a stunning, skin-tight black corset, she brutally binds and whips the other girl. In more horrors, the story deepens - and so does the torture when Miss Sharon Mitchell arrives to raise the stakes.
